WorkItem.Description:
i play a pve raiding mage/ret pally/ prot warrior and when i go to look at upgrades i get clumped with all the PVP weapons and gear.. as well as dps weapons on a prot warrior.. (WTF??) 
Â 
im jsut wondering if theres any way to remove the PVP items from the upgrade listing so everything wont be so clusterF...
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] Anyway to remove pvp items from the listings in Rawr

Comments.Message: There is a filter to uncheck PvP gear.
ok...could u possible tell me how to uncheck the pvp gear in the filter?

To the top right of the comparisons pane (the big bars on the right half of the window), there is a dropdown called "Filters" - uncheck the PvP option.

Note that, in certain cases, PvP gear really can be an upgrade, speaking from a DPS/tanking perspective.  If you're simply dismissing them because of a certain stigma attached, that is a poor reason to ignore them.

This is a resolved issue.

im dismissing them because i dont pvp and i dont really care to pvp for the gear either..

o and for some of the items i also had to uncheck "other" to get most of the pvp items gone... guess weapons arnt classified as PVP....
